items.title: Why LootMogul Marketplace?
items.description: We are a prolific sports web3 gaming and e-commerce space working unitedly with a community of athletes and sports fans to build an online platform that allows ownership of sports specific unique digital assets.

items.title: Benefits of LootMogul Marketplace
items.description: A functional marketplace offers brands and individuals multiple ways of making an income by creating and showcasing innovative collectibles, promoting brand & product, selling merchandise. And all of these with In Real Life utilities.

items.title: Sell, Collect & Share
items.description: Curate from a wide range of exclusive LootMogul digital collectibles. Sell your collection or share it with your friends, family, or community. Digital Collectibles are the main functionality of this marketplace.

items.title: Wide range of Collection
items.description: Browse through our range - Sporticon, Platina, Meta Avatars, Trading Cards, and others from our selection of digital collectibles. If you are a sports enthusiast, this section is for you. All our collectibles comes with In Real Life or In Game Play utilities.
